title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Project-Based Curriculum Focusing on Refrigeration and Air Conditioning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can decode basic refrigeration system circuit diagrams and perform electrical wiring tasks with 90% accuracy
Design and implementation of HVAC system control logic using PLCs

Using Python-based integrated system simulation tools (e.g., AnyLogic, MATLAB), learners implement ≥3 energy efficiency optimization algorithms and propose solutions achieving either ≥15% reduction in energy consumption or ≥10% improvement in system performance from simulation results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
